attributes.action: Write off debt outstanding on student loans for healthcare staff
attributes.additional_details: The public servants from the NHS are sacrificing their lifestyle to ensure the public’s safety during this worldwide pandemic. Stepping up to the mark of their duty of care to patients, all healthcare workers who are currently employed should have the option to have their student loans write off. I think the government should consider this write off to show appreciation to the amazing National Health Service
attributes.background: To thank our amazing National Health Service for their great sacrifice during our nations time of need I request that the government write off employed healthcare workers outstanding student loans. This would be to include social/health care workers outside of the NHS to patients who are home bound.
